balanceOf(address).details: Returns the balance of the `who` address.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfers `value` tokens from `msg.sender` to `to` address and returns `true` on success.

transfer(address,uint256,bytes).details: Transfers `value` tokens from `msg.sender` to `to` address with `data` parameter and returns `true` on success.
